welcomeMessage: Welcome to HackAware! Learn how to stay safe online.

lessonA.title: What is Phishing?
lessonA.description: Learn about phishing and how to identify fake messages.

lessonB.title: Malicious Apps & Permissions
lessonB.description: Understand the risks of fake apps and how to manage permissions.

lessonC.title: Network & Wi-Fi Risks
lessonC.description: Discover the dangers of using public Wi-Fi and how to protect yourself.

lessonD.title: Importance of OS Updates
lessonD.description: Learn why keeping your operating system updated is crucial for security.

quizB.title: Permissions Quiz
quizB.instructions: Check your understanding of app permissions.

quizC.title: Network Risks Quiz
quizC.instructions: Evaluate your awareness of network security.

quizD.title: OS Updates Quiz
quizD.instructions: Assess your knowledge about system updates.

checklist.item1: Enable updates - Keep OS & apps up to date.
checklist.item2: Don't install unknown apps - Only use Play Store / App Store.
checklist.item3: Review app permissions - Grant least privileges.
checklist.item4: Use strong PIN & 2FA - Protect accounts and SIM.
checklist.item5: Avoid public Wi-Fi for sensitive tasks - use VPN if needed.
